featured.text: You might speed up healing time by gently pressing a warm washcloth 20 your eyelid for 10 minutes, 3 or 4 times a day.

definition.zh_def: 用於清潔身體或物品的小布塊，通常用於洗澡或擦拭。
definition.en_def: A small piece of cloth used for washing the body or cleaning surfaces, typically used in bathing.
definition.example: She used a washcloth to gently scrub her face.
